JECRC admissions are based on online registration through the official website. You must fill the application form, upload required documents, and proceed with counseling.
To take admission, visit JECRC's official website and complete the application form. A counselor will guide you through the next steps.
Eligibility for B.Tech: Minimum 45% in PCM (40% for reserved categories).
For B.Tech admission, you need 45% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
Required documents: 10th & 12th marksheet, Transfer Certificate, Migration Certificate, Aadhar Card, Photographs, and Entrance Exam Scorecard (if applicable).
You can contact JECRC admission helpline at +91-141-1234567 (example).
For admission queries, please visit the JECRC campus admission cell.
